# tsty

A simple command-line utility for changing your terminal colors and styles

# TODOS

- make Windows powershell/wsl compatible




Install this tool using `pip`:



```bash
pip install tsty
```


Basic usage:

```bash
$ tsty red   # changes 

## Dev and Testing


```sh
# install locally
$ pip install -e .


# run all tests
$ pytest

# run just alpha tests
$ pytest -m 'alpha'


# skip alpha tests
$ pytest -m 'not alpha'
```
